sentences.en: An added descriptive comment or explanatory note.
sentences.cn: 一种附加的描述性的解释或说明性注解.

sentences.en: Descriptive ecology is a dry subject.
sentences.cn: 描述性的生态学是干燥无味的课题.

sentences.en: Descriptive of a device which converts a serial input into a parallel output.
sentences.cn: 描述一种设备能把串行输入转换成并行输出的功能.

sentences.en: He tried to maintain an ordinary , conversational, descriptive tone.
sentences.cn: 他竭力保持着一种平常谈话般的, 平铺直叙的语气.

sentences.en: He wrote a book descriptive of the frontier provinces.
sentences.cn: 他写了一本描写边疆各省的专著.

sentences.en: In reading a novel, he generally skips over all the long descriptive passages.
sentences.cn: 阅读小说时, 他总是把那些冗长的描写统统跳过去不看.

sentences.en: The book contains sublime descriptive passages.
sentences.cn: 这本书中有好几个优美的描写片段.

sentences.en: the descriptive passages in the novel
The endless variations of drainage pattern make descriptive characteristics difficult.
sentences.cn: 水系型式的无限变化给描述特征带来了困难.

sentences.en: The music is descriptive rather than programmatic.
sentences.cn: 这种音乐是叙事性的而不属于标题音乐.

sentences.en: These stages are not merely descriptive.
sentences.cn: 这些阶段不只是说明性的.

sentences.en: This book is descriptive of a scientific exploration.
sentences.cn: 这本书是描写科学探险的.

sentences.en: We will display all descriptive and identifying date for each pollutant source.
sentences.cn: 我们列出每个污染源的所有说明性和标准性的数据.

sentences.en: Write a descriptive passage about spring.
sentences.cn: 写一篇描写春天的短文.

sentences.en: Your words are very descriptive, I understand exactly.
sentences.cn: 你的话非常生动, 我都听懂了.

words.tran_cn: 描写主义；描述主义；描述论
